me sandaha wayakerena mudala rupiyal miliyana 1478ki.me margaya sanwardhanaya sandaha china rajaye aadhara labi athi athara mehidi adahas dakwu janadhipathithuma laba dun memasahayogayata china rajaya wetha siya sthuthiya pala kara sitiyeya.eda paswalin sadu parawal me wana wita konkrit kara athi bawath ada eewa kapat kara usas thaththwayata path kirimata katayuthu kara athi bawath mehidi pawasu janadhipathithuma shri lankawa pura sama aasayanak thulama marga sanwardhanaya sidukerena bawada penwa dunneya.horawala, palawaththa, pitigala marga wyapruthiya wiwrutha kirime awasthawata wawili karmantha amathya mahinda samarasinha, amathya piyasena gamage, waraya ha mahamarga niyojya amathya nirmala kothalawala yana mahathwarun athulu palathe deshapalana niyojithayoda, shri lankawe china thanapathi yan kshuyi ing mahatha da ek wa siti athara, 1956 – 67 kalaya thula mathugamin parlimenthuwa niyojanaya kala hitapu amathya daya ti paskuwal, basnahira palath amathyawaru, walallawita pradeshiya sabhawe sabhapathi udeni athukorala, marga sanwardhana lekam sujatha kure, marga sanwardhana adhikariye sabhapathi aar.dabliw.aar pemasiri yana mahathwaru athulu pirisak da sahabhagi wuha.palawaththa, neluwa, morawaka marga wyapruthiya aarambha kirime awasthawata dakunu palath pradhana amathya shan wijayalal da silwa, rajya paripalana niyojya amathya wijaya dahanayaka, parlimenthu manthri hemal gunasekara, palath sabha manthri chandima rasaputhra yana mahathwarun athulu palath deshapalana niyojithayan saha palathe rajya niladharin ekwa sitiyaha..
